titleStmt.title: England's miserie, and remedie in a judicious letter from an utter-barrister to his speciall friend, concerning Leiutenant [sic] Col. Lilburn's imprisonment in Newgate, Sept: 1645.
titleStmt.author: Utter-Barrister.
Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.
Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
Wildman, John, Sir, 1621?-1693.
Sexby, Edward, d. 1658.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Richard Overton, John Lilburne, John Wildman and Edward Sexby.
Annotation on Thomason copy: between Sept: and 1645: "14" "7br 19th" [i.e. September 19th]; "Lilburne's owne".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
